Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 198th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Eduardo Marpons (BRO)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/16/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $1,791,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Boston on 4/3/2017...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Injured on 6/17/2018 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/11/2018 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
